subject: Lockouts
Collective Bargaining
Hockey, Ice
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: On the 41st day of the N.H.L. lockout, the November schedule was canceled, bringing the total of wiped-out games to 326.
snippet: On the 41st day of the N.H.L. lockout, the November schedule was canceled, bringing the total of wiped-out games to 326.
